chn: adj. 沮丧, 情绪低落
example_en: She felt really down after hearing the bad news.
example_cn: 听到坏消息后，她感到非常沮丧。
word_family: downcast (adj. 沮丧的), downhearted (adj. 灰心的), downturn (n. 低迷时期)
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'dūn'，意为‘山丘’，引申为‘向下’。联想记忆：想象一个人从山顶滑下来，情绪也随之低落。图像记忆：画一个从山顶滑下的人，表情沮丧。

image_prompt.main_image: A person sitting on a hilltop with a sad expression, looking down at the ground, with a dark cloud above their head.
